## Argument group

### Arguments



:::{.column-body-outset}
|Name       |Description       |Attributes                                                 |
|:----------|:-----------------|:----------------------------------------------------------|
|`--input`  |Input mtx folder  |`file`, required, example: "input_dir_containing_gz_files" |
|`--output` |Output h5mu file. |`file`, example: "output.h5mu"                             |
:::
